IsFulfillmentCenter.description: If location is a fulfillment center

IsWarehouseManaged.description: If the location is warehouse managed.

FulfilmentCenterDeductStockWhenProcessed.description: Fulfilment center and stock will be deducted when order processed

IsWarehouseManaged.description: Indicates if the location is warehouse managed

IsFulfillmentCenter.description: If location is a fulfillment center

SupplierMinOrderQty.description: Minimum order quantity from this supplier

IsFulfillmentCenter.description: If location is a fulfillment center

IsWarehouseManaged.description: If the location is warehouse managed

Due.description: Due to come in purchase orders

JIT.description: Stock Item Just In Time (JIT) status

UnitCost.description: if( Quantity == 0 ) dbo.StockItem.PurchasePrice Else CurrentStockValue / Quantity

LastUpdateDate.description: Last time stock level was adjusted

StockItemPurchasePrice.description: Stock item purchase price. It's used to calculate UnitCost

IsMain.description: Is the image the main image

RawChecksum.description: Raw file checksum (Used for UI to determine if the image file is the same before submitting for upload)

isBatchedStockType.description: Returns true is the stock item is tracked by batch

TaxRate.description: Default item tax rate. Set -1 to use country tax rate

InventoryTrackingType.description: Stock item tracking type. 0 = none. 1 = Ordered by Sell by Date. 2 = Ordered by Priority Sequence

BatchNumberScanRequired.description: User must scan batch number when procesing orders

SerialNumberScanRequired.description: User must scan item serial number when processing ordesr

dReceivedDate.description: Date when order was received on a channel

timeDiff.description: Days elapsed between order received and order processed

PostalServiceName.description: Postal service name (e.g. Next day delivery)

SecondaryReference.description: An additional reference number for the order

ExternalReference.description: This is an additional reference number from the sales channel, typically used by eBay

ChannelBuyerName.description: Channel specific name used to identify the buyer, such as a username, normally used for eBay

dPaidOn.description: When order was marked as PAID

HoldOrCancel.description: If order on hold or cancelled.

IsResend.description: If order was created from a resend

IsExchange.description: If order was created from an exchange

ProcessedDateTime.description: Date and time when order was processed

Status.description: Order Status (0 = UNPAID, 1 = PAID, 2 = RETURN, 3 = PENDING, 4 = RESEND)

IsRuleRun.description: If rules engine rule ran on an order

Marker.description: Order marker (0 = NOT TAG, 1 = Tag 1, 2 = Tag 2, 3 = Tag 3, 4 = Tag 4, 5 = Tag 5, 6 = Tag 6, 7 = Parked)

IdentifierId.description: Internal identifier id. Use to update image and name.

IsCustom.description: Is the tag user or system defined?

Name.description: Name displayed where the tag is used

SecondaryReference.description: An additional reference number for the orderr (Used by some channels)

ExternalReferenceNum.description: This is an additional reference number from the sales channel, typically used by eBay

ReceivedDate.description: The date and time at which the order was placed on the sales channel

SiteCode.description: SiteCode used to differentiate between different sites from a single channel (eg. Amazon UK, Amazon US, Amazon FR...)

HoldOrCancel.description: This shows whether the order has been marked as on hold, for processed orders if the order has been cancelled OnHold = 1

ScheduledDelivery.description: Scheduled delivery dates. Take priority over despatch by date

PostalServiceName.description: Postal service name (e.g. Next day delivery)

TrackingNumber.description: Order tracking number provided by courier

ManualAdjust.description: If there is an adjustment to shipping cost was made

TotalDiscount.description: Total discount applied to the order

ConversionRate.description: Currency conversion rate. Set at point of save by the currency

FolderName.description: Folder names assigned to an order

OnPurchaseOrder.description: Purchase order bound to this item

Tax.description: Actual tax value on an item

CompositeSubItems.$comment: It should be "$ref": "#/properties/Items" but Airbyte doesn't support recursive $refs.

TaxCostInclusive.description: If tax is included in a cost

BinRacks.description: List of BinRacks used for OrderItem

BatchId.description: If the item is batched, identifies the batch number

OrderItemBatchId.description: If the item is batched, identifies the unique order item batch row

InventoryTrackingType.description: Identifies whether the item has a sell by date or other defined order in which inventory is to be sold

NoteDate.description: Date and time when note was added

PaidDateTime.description: Date and time when the order was marked as paid
